medicines.name: Hydroxychloroquine (Probably a Medicine Name)
medicines.purpose: Preventive medication against COVID-19, based on ICMR guidelines for contacts of positive cases.
medicines.special_instructions: To be taken as a preventive measure, alongside social distancing, hand hygiene, and wearing a mask, as per ICMR guidelines. Probably to be taken by contacts of COVID-19 positive cases showing mild symptoms.

medicines.name: Vitamin C (Medicine Name)
medicines.special_instructions: Take daily for general well-being; no specific instructions mentioned.

medicines.name: Zinc (Medicine Name)
medicines.duration: As needed in case of fever
medicines.purpose: Immune support and to alleviate fever symptoms
medicines.special_instructions: Take daily in case of fever symptoms; no specific instructions mentioned.

medicines.name: Crocin/Calpol (Medicine Name)
medicines.special_instructions: Take only when required for fever or pain symptoms.

medicines.name: Cetirizine (Medicine Name)
medicines.special_instructions: Take once daily for allergy symptoms; no specific instructions mentioned.

medicines.name: Alex (Medicine Name)
medicines.special_instructions: Take three times a day to relieve cough symptoms; no specific instructions mentioned.

general_instructions: As per ICMR guideline, the contacts of COVID tve cases should be put on HOME ISOLATION even with Mild Symptoms. It is advised that everybody takes these preventive medication apart from following SOCIAL DISTANCING, HAND HYGIENE & WEARING MASK
